item.title: Field Notes - Cincinnati
item.description: Last updated: 30 Apr 2024 Notes: First impressions of Cincinnati (And the USA) As it happens, in the great year of 2024 I have moved to Cincinnati. Nevermind why, that’s my business. Anyway, I thought I’d put down some field notes from the first couple of months - first impressions and questions and all that - sort of Devon Zuegel on Miami inspired. These are just the passing observations of an ignorant Southern African, don’t take them too seriously - no doubt there will be some prize foolishness throughout.

item.title: Interesting questions, for yourself, and others
item.description: A good question can be a wonderful thing. Well, I thought I might start a collection! To get better at questions, and to probe more deeply into my own skull, for both general psychic inquiries and more specific situations. If you have good ones, please share them with me!
